body:
To answer my own question:
After extensive research and assistance from Google's Tech team, the following information came to light.
The delay I described is expected as per the following link:
https://www.google.com/url?hl=en&q=https://support.google.com/a/answer/7061566&source=gmail&ust=1472481859967000&usg=AFQjCNEpwbP6ZBUFyVOBOl8VVONAsGvKLQ
title: Very Slow Google Admin SDK Responses - Is it a technical issue?
